alert.note: Alert for Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, south central Craven and northeastern Onslow Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maysville, or 11 miles northeast of Pumpkin Center, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, River Bend, Maysville, Belgrade, Rhems, Catfish Lake, Deppe, Loco VFD and Pollocksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Southern Craven
